text: The Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba was established at the party's founding congress in 1975. The Second Secretary of the Communist Party of Cuba leads the body. ==1st Congress: 1975–1980== * First Secretary Fidel Castro Ruz * Second Secretary Raul Castro Ruz * Blas Roca Calderío * Carlos Rafael Rodriguez * Pedro Miret Prieto * Isidoro Malmierca Peoli * Jorge Valdés-Saldaña Risquet * Antonio Pérez Herrero * Raúl García Pelaez ==2nd Congress: 1980–1986== * First Secretary: Fidel Castro Ruz * Second Secretary: Raúl Castro Ruz * Pedro Miret Prieto * José Ramón Machado Ventura * Jorge Risquet Valdés-Saldaña * Antonio Pérez Herrero * Jesús Montané Oropesa * Lionel Soto Prieto * Julián Rizo Álvarez ==3rd Congress: 1986–1991== * First Secretary: Fidel Castro Ruz * Second Secretary: Raul Castro Ruz * Jose Ramon Machado Ventura * Jorge Valdés-Saldaña Risquet * Julián Álvarez Rizo * José Ramón Balaguer Cabrera * Sixto Batista Santana * Jaime Crombet Hernandez- Baquero * Lionel Soto Prieto ==6th Congress: 2011–2016== * Jose Ramon Machado Ventura * Abelardo Alvarez Gil * Gaute Victor Lopez * Olga Lidia Tapia Iglesias * José Ramón Balaguer * Omar Ruiz Martín * Jorge Cuevas Ramos ==7th Congress: 2016–2021-== *José Ramón Machado Ventura *Abelardo Álvarez Gil *José Ramón Balaguer Cabrera *Olga Lidia Tapia Iglesias *Omar Fernando Ruiz Martín *Jorge Cuevas Ramos ==References== Category:Communist Party of Cuba Category:Secretariats of communist parties
title: Secretariat of the Communist Party of Cuba
